forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 10C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 50F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 36F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 46F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 3C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High near 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 37F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 51F. SE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 11C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 51F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low around 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
